text: Jecin George is an Indian musician, film score composer, programmer and singer. He started off as assistant of Deepak Dev, Rahul Raj and Gopi Sunder. ==Career== Jecin George made his debut in music direction in year 2014 with the film Asha Black. All the songs in this film were received with mixed reviews, especially Neermizhiyil Peeythozhiyaa, a romantic song sung by singer Vijay Yesudas with lyrics by Din Nath Puthanchery. He entered the Malayalam industry doing Film score for the film Beware of Dogs. He also did additional orchestration and sound programming for eminent music directors like Gopi Sunder Gopi Sunder and Deepak Dev. His major works in as programmer includes Koothara, Salalah Mobiles, Ring Master and Ithihasa George has been in the industry since 2009. He has worked as assistant to Deepak Dev, Rahul Raj and Gopi Sunder.http://timesofindia.indiatimes.com/entertainment/malayalam/movies/news/Debutant- composer-to-introduce-new-genre-in-Mollywood-music/articleshow/22814444.cms. Jecin's musical accomplishments proceed him, including his remixes of well- known artist such as squarehead and klayton of celldweller.https://www.indabamusic.com/opportunities/demon-hunter-someone-to- hate-remix-contest/winners Jecin placed in top Ten place in square head's remix competition for "Idiot".http://www.fixtstore.com/product/63222/Squarehead---Idiot- Remixes-%28feat.-Klayton-of-Celldweller%29-%28MP3-Album%29 Jecin George will compose music for upcoming movies Charminar, Kantharam and Poru. == As composer == {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 100%;" |- ! width=30 | Year ! width=180| Film ! width=70 | Language ! width=65 | Songs ! width=65 | Background Score !
